ca.eandb.jmist.framework.path

Class TransformedPathNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.eandb.jmist.framework.path.AbstractPathNode
      • ca.eandb.jmist.framework.path.TransformedPathNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PathNode
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TransformedEyeNode

    public abstract class TransformedPathNode
extends AbstractPathNode
    A PathNode that has had an affine transformation applied to it.
    Author:
    Brad Kimmel
